name: Curvature-scale-space-corners-and-transformations
tagline: Curvature Scale Space contour matcher and  corner detector and other computer vision programs
body:
The project implements a corner detector, a contour matcher and image transformation solver using properties of curvature scale space.

The project is still in implementation phase! Nearly ready for testing, but not there yet.

Here are some of the notes while implementing:

[contours](https://github.com/nking/curvature-scale-space-corners-and-transformations/raw/master/doc/contours.pdf)

[projection](https://github.com/nking/curvature-scale-space-corners-and-transformations/raw/master/doc/projection.pdf)

[skyline extraction](https://github.com/nking/curvature-scale-space-corners-and-transformations/raw/master/doc/skyline_extraction.pdf)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
